*Blizzard sighs when Sinesis punches himself* Blizzard: Twister! Get back h=
ere and help! *Blizzard yells out to Twister who was heading for the base* =
Twister: Your not the boss of me!!!!! *Twister says and than runs towards t=
he Pred base but is shot by the auto guns. She backs out of the range of th=
e auto guns after being shot several times* Twister: SLAG!


*Blizzard sigh=
s and tries to pick Sinesis up*
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: THE=
CODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, July 14, 2000 8:29 PM
  Sub=
ject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  "Yeah, I got all of him, unfortunently." Sines=
is said, taking Blizzard's hand and trying to get up. He is unable and he h=
its himself in the face...
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: ilov=
ealllizards 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Friday, July 14, 2000 4:=
43 PM
    Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


    *Blizzard bends down* Blizzard:=
 Do you have all of Sinister? *Blizzard says to Sinesis*
      ----- Origin=
al Message ----- 
      From: THECODE 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      =
Sent: Friday, July 14, 2000 4:04 AM
      Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


   =
   "Fine, but don't be surprised if I kill you!" Sinesis said to Blizzard, =
coughing a few times.

      "Ah, never mind that last sentence, I need hel=
p, too." Sinesis said...
        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From=
: ilovealllizards 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Thursday, =
July 13, 2000 12:36 AM
        Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


        *Blizz=
ard stopped reaching for Sinister's pieces when she saw Sinesis picking his=
 parts up* Blizzard: Please let me help... *Blizzard says to Sinesis*
     =
     ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: THECODE 
          To: n=
bwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Thursday, July 13, 2000 12:14 AM
       =
   Subject: Neo Beast Wars


          Deemos helps Inzola back to their sh=
ip and he starts to repair her, but to no avail. Deemos, very hurt himself,=
 went to the Predacon base.

          "My wife, you see she in hurt, and I=
 need to use your CR Chambers, I have been told that this is the base of th=
e mighty Hell Beast, how can I help you, Hell Beast? Just heal Inzola and m=
yself!" Deemos called out to Anyone in Hell Beast's base.

          Sinesi=
s slowly crawled along, pushing Sinister's parts. Sinesis stopped every mil=
e to catch his breath, his jets her wrecked. He kept going and going and go=
ing.

          Plintissa seen a letter from Dracona, saying she had retrun=
ed to base. Plintissa shrugged and walked along her way. Artist tripped her=
 up and walked on ahead. Plintissa felt like crying again, this is the one =
she loved? Artist laughed and went on his way.

          Dracona picked up=
 the device, but suddenly, the device exploded, sending a fireball into the=
 Predacon base. (Megatron's base) Dracona gasped. She had better be going n=
ow. She slowly started to sneak away.

          The Radicons hurried on th=
eir way, maybe some other team would apreciate their skills, like the Allia=
nce. Airbomber just hoped that Infectra would come with them.

          Li=
ghtmare's spark joined the Matrix, she is DEAD.

          Gangon's spark h=
overed in front of BrightBlade, swirling around her over and over again.

-=
